# Welcome to Space Station 14!
You've just started your shift aboard a Nanotrasen space station. It's up to you and your fellow crewmates to work together, survive, and have fun!
[bold]Follow all server rules.[/bold] You can ask questions or report rule violations to the [color=#EB2D3A][bold]admin[/bold][/color] team using the [bold]admin help menu[/bold]. ([italic]accessible by pressing [/italic][color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenAHelp"/][/bold][/color])
More detailed guides for [italic]specific jobs[/italic] and [italic]game mechanics[/italic] can be found [textlink="here." link="SS14"/]
This guidebook can be opened at any time by pressing [color=yellow][bold][keybind="OpenGuidebook"][/bold][/color].
## Basic Controls Below are the controls that you'll need for regular gameplay:
- Move around using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="MoveUp"][keybind="MoveLeft"][keybind="MoveDown"][keybind="MoveRight"][/bold][/color]. Hold [color=yellow][bold][keybind="Walk"][/bold][/color] to walk.
- Examine the world around you with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ExamineEntity"][/bold][/color]
- Interact with the world using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="Use"][/bold][/color]
- Point at something and press [color=yellow][bold][keybind="UseSecondary"][/bold][/color] to see the [italic]context menu[/italic], which has additional interactions
- Switch hands using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="SwapHands"][/bold][/color] and activate your currently held item with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ActivateItemInHand"][/bold][/color]
- Drop an item with [color=yellow][bold][keybind="Drop"][/bold][/color] or throw it using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ThrowItemInHand"][/bold][/color]
- Pull and release objects using [color=yellow][bold][keybind="TryPullObject"][/bold][/color] and [color=yellow][bold][keybind="ReleasePulledObject"][/bold][/color]
A more detailed list can be found in the [textlink="controls" link="Controls"] page.
## What is SS14? Space Station 14 is a multiplayer game about paranoia and chaos on a space station and a remake of the classic cult classic Space Station 13.
Join dozens of other players on a highly detailed and simulated space station, engaging in roleplay and dealing with the threats thrown your way.
SS14 is a [italic]free and open source game[/italic] developed by people [bold]just like you![/bold] It gets [color=lime]daily updates[/color] and can sometimes be [color=#EB2D3A][bold]unstable.[/bold][/color]
[italic]If you want to report bugs or help with development, join the discord and learn where to start.[/italic]
